ai-tha-ap140:1.2_0: So the mendicants who live in the head,
ai-tha-ap140:2.2_0: the great seer, the great seer.
ai-tha-ap140:2.3_0: Indeed there is no sorrow in him.
ai-tha-ap140:3.2_0: Having raised my joined palms to him,
ai-tha-ap140:3.3_0: after worshipping the Teacher, worshipping him,
ai-tha-ap140:3.4_0: went away from Pāvā to see her.
ai-tha-ap140:4.2_0: The King was the Lord of the World,
ai-tha-ap140:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Piṅgiya.
ai-tha-ap140:7.1_0: This is the eighth Elder Nun Mettiya.
